body.ab:
You are hereby retained as special assistant to the Attorney General, for the purpose of arguing, in the Supreme Court of the United States the case of The United States, appellants, vs. the heirs of Juan Buadista Vigil, No. 217, for which you will be entitled to receive reasonable compensation, to be
Mr. Wills retained in Vigil case.
determined by the Attorney General.
Should it be your pleasure to accept this commission, you will please take the oath as required by the seventeenth section of the Act of July 22, 1870, and transmit a copy thereof to this office.
The Solicitor General will furnish you a transcript of the record.
